attributes.action: Reduce the cost of Fuel to road users.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Fuel costs are now at their highest ever
compared with other Countries we pay the most expensive fuel costs. So much so it now is getting too expensive to go to work for some families. The Government is supposed to be working for the people and not the people working for the Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
